first_translate: to let one person’s thoughts affect you so much...
I feel like you’re wasting your time on him.
this is just out of curiosity,
but are you really dating siegren...?

hangle: 약혼이나 결혼 생각은 아직 없는 거고?
first_translate: or do you plan on getting engaged or married someday?
that's right. at least not yet...
then why did you ask me all of a sudden?
it’s because I thought things were weird between you two.

hangle: 틀어지면 곤란한 사이라 적당히 사귀고 있는 건가?
first_translate: is he someone you can’t afford to break up with? is that why you’re still together?

hangle: 오히려 시그렌에 대한 내 마음이 좀 그래.
first_translate: my feelings toward him are what bother me.

hangle: 시그렌을 갖고 싶다고 생각하는 내 마음이.
first_translate: the more I want to have him as mine.
if you asked whether I found this situation bothersome,
if you asked whether I found this situation bothersome,
then yes, I would say so.

hangle: 나, 왜 갑자기 이렇게 인기가 폭발하는 거야!!
first_translate: what’s going on?! why am I suddenly popular?!

hangle: 혹시… 영애가 제가 한 일에 대해서 이야기하셨나요?
first_translate: did lady fiona tell everyone about what happened?

hangle: 갑자기 이런 시선을 받는 것도 부담스러운데요.
first_translate: all these people staring at me makes me uncomfortable though.
lady fiona, get used to it.

hangle: 앞으론 우리가 이렇게 사교계를 제패할 테니까.
first_translate: from now on, we’ll conquer high society together.
wait, don’t you think our goal has gotten too big?

hangle: 기왕 태어난 거 꿈은 크게 가져야죠.
first_translate: when you dream, always aim higher.
is he someone you can’t afford to break up with? is that why you’re still together?

and neither will I take you there.
abel might make a fuss if she finds out.

hangle: 딱, 한 번만 물을 거야. 대답해줘.
